channel.title: Usefull Batch V1 (Lock if wrong section Please)
channel.description:
NOTE: This Is My 1st Post Here! I Post At Moparscape.org/smf but i coudnt find a section to do this And I didnt Use Frells BatchIDE I Did It Myself :)
Features:
Folder Maker Runner Faster Browser Runner Changed The Color Of the Background And Text :D
I Was Gonna put WAYYYY More Things But I Guess i Was A Bit lazy... But all Those Other Features Will Come In V2!
This Is The Script: [code]#THIS BATCH FILE IS ANTI-LEECH # #FROM DARK PALADIN LORD # #Leech and i Kill You XD # ##################################
@echo off color 6b title Usefull Batch file V.1 By Dark paladin lord :menu cls echo Welcome To Usefull Batch V.1 echo. echo Please Select An Option: echo. echo f - Make a Folder echo r - To run a Program echo ie - Open Internet Explorer (Must Exist On Computer!) echo ff - Open FireFox (Must Exist On Computer!) echo exit - To Exit echo. set /p menuoption=Option : if %menuoption%==f goto folder if %menuoption%==r goto run if %menuoption%==ie goto iexplore if %menuoption%==ff goto firefox if %menuoption%==exit goto exit goto errorStart :errorStart title Error cls echo There Has Been an Error echo. echo Error: %menuoption% echo. echo Please Avoid Putting Capital letters echo. echo Press Any Key to go back... pause >nul goto :menu :folder title Folder Maker cls echo Welcome To Folder Maker! echo. echo Please Type The Name Of The Folder You Want to Make echo. echo NOTE: It Will Be Made In The Location of This Batch File! echo. set /p foldername=Name : goto :makefolder :makefolder title Please Wait cls echo Please Wait Making %foldername%! md %foldername% title Done Operation cls echo Operation Complete! echo. echo Press Any Key to Go To Main menu... pause >nul goto :menu :run title File Runner cls echo welcome to The file Runner! echo. echo Please Enter The Name And Type Of the file! echo. echo EXAMPLE: telnet.exe echo. set /p runone=Name : goto :runfile :runfile title Please Wait... cls echo Please Wait Running %runone%! start %runone% title Done Operation cls echo Operation Complete! echo. echo Press Any key to go to Main menu... pause >nul goto :menu :iexplore title Please Wait... cls echo Please wait Running Browser! start IEXPLORE.EXE title Done Operation cls echo Finished Operation! echo. echo Press Any key To go To menu... pause >nul goto :menu :firefox title Please wait... cls echo Please Wait Running Browser! start firefox.exe title Done operation cls echo Operation complete! echo. echo press Any Key to Go to menu... pause >nul goto :menu :exit title Exit close [/code]
Paste The script on notepad Go To file Save As Call It Whatever You like... (Recommended Usefull batch File) Click All Programmes (So It Doesnt Save it As blabla.bat.txt) Click save
As I Said I Am Gonna put LOADS Of features To V2!
And Sorry If This is the wrong Section Because This is my First Post In This forum...

item.dc:creator: @Yz85Racer Yz85Racer
item.description:
@Yz85Racer wrote:

[quote=“Daed, post:7, topic:133457”][quote]No, just a dumbass creating a batch file to do things that could be accomplished with a right click - majority of the things it does anyway.
[/quote]

I seriously think you need to shutup and start thinking of others, he is just sharing something he has made, so what if it may seem useless? you seem useless with all your negativity. Thanks for sharing your work with us dark paladin lord, i think its nice and am looking forward to a V2.[/quote]
I seriously think you need to go away.
This is completely useless. So what? He’s starting. MAKE SOMETHING USEFULL.
If not. You do it.

Read full topic

item.title: Usefull Batch V1 (Lock if wrong section Please)
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

echo Please wait Running Browser!
start IEXPLORE.EXE

doesnt mean it will run browser faster it will run the same speed as it did when you clicked on Internet Explorer shortcut.

but if you wish to run it faster you acutally code… I do…

start IEXPLORE -k
that starts it in full screen. WITHOUT ToolBar really fast… nice for movies.

start IEXPLORE -extoff
this is the fastest u could get it removes everything from your internet explorer when you run it google toolbar gone / pdf viewer gone all that rarely used stuff.

Read full topic

item.title: Usefull Batch V1 (Lock if wrong section Please)
item.dc:creator: @dark_paladin_lord dark paladin lord
item.description:
@dark_paladin_lord wrote:

NOTE: This Is My 1st Post Here! I Post At Moparscape.org/smf but i coudnt find a section to do this
And I didnt Use Frells BatchIDE I Did It Myself

Features:

Folder Maker
Runner
Faster Browser Runner
Changed The Color Of the Background And Text

I Was Gonna put WAYYYY More Things But I Guess i Was A Bit lazy… But all Those Other Features Will Come
In V2!

This Is The Script:

[code]#THIS BATCH FILE IS ANTI-LEECH #
#FROM DARK PALADIN LORD #
#Leech and i Kill You XD #
##################################

@echo off
color 6b
title Usefull Batch file V.1 By Dark paladin lord
:menu
cls
echo Welcome To Usefull Batch V.1
echo.
echo Please Select An Option:
echo.
echo f - Make a Folder
echo r - To run a Program
echo ie - Open Internet Explorer (Must Exist On Computer!)
echo ff - Open FireFox (Must Exist On Computer!)
echo exit - To Exit
echo.
set /p menuoption=Option :
if %menuoption%==f goto folder
if %menuoption%==r goto run
if %menuoption%==ie goto iexplore
if %menuoption%==ff goto firefox
if %menuoption%==exit goto exit
goto errorStart
:errorStart
title Error
cls
echo There Has Been an Error
echo.
echo Error: %menuoption%
echo.
echo Please Avoid Putting Capital letters
echo.
echo Press Any Key to go back…
pause >nul
goto :menu
:folder
title Folder Maker
cls
echo Welcome To Folder Maker!
echo.
echo Please Type The Name Of The Folder You Want to Make
echo.
echo NOTE: It Will Be Made In The Location of This Batch File!
echo.
set /p foldername=Name :
goto :makefolder
:makefolder
title Please Wait
cls
echo Please Wait Making %foldername%!
md %foldername%
title Done Operation
cls
echo Operation Complete!
echo.
echo Press Any Key to Go To Main menu…
pause >nul
goto :menu
:run
title File Runner
cls
echo welcome to The file Runner!
echo.
echo Please Enter The Name And Type Of the file!
echo.
echo EXAMPLE: telnet.exe
echo.
set /p runone=Name :
goto :runfile
:runfile
title Please Wait…
cls
echo Please Wait Running %runone%!
start %runone%
title Done Operation
cls
echo Operation Complete!
echo.
echo Press Any key to go to Main menu…
pause >nul
goto :menu
:iexplore
title Please Wait…
cls
echo Please wait Running Browser!
start IEXPLORE.EXE
title Done Operation
cls
echo Finished Operation!
echo.
echo Press Any key To go To menu…
pause >nul
goto :menu
:firefox
title Please wait…
cls
echo Please Wait Running Browser!
start firefox.exe
title Done operation
cls
echo Operation complete!
echo.
echo press Any Key to Go to menu…
pause >nul
goto :menu
:exit
title Exit
close
[/code]

Paste The script on notepad
Go To file
Save As
Call It Whatever You like… (Recommended Usefull batch File)
Click All Programmes (So It Doesnt Save it As blabla.bat.txt)
Click save

As I Said I Am Gonna put LOADS Of features To V2!

And Sorry If This is the wrong Section Because This is my First Post In This forum…

Read full topic
item.source: Usefull Batch V1 (Lock if wrong section Please)
